pcof=[1e-3, -1e-3, 2e-3]
T=150, N=4, Nguard=3, Ntot=7, CFL=0.05
order=2

octave:
[f g] = traceobjgrad(pcof,1,1e-8,2,1);
f =    6.869860886977830e-01
g =[4.327825072713078e-02,
      2.729063144708402e-02
      1.693594514047130e-02]

julia:
exampleobjfunc()
objv: [0.6869860886977829]
objgrad: [0.04327825072713077; 0.02729063144708413; 0.016935945140471326]
